name: AC-130 Gunship Simulator: Special Ops Squadron
name_original: AC-130 Gunship Simulator: Special Ops Squadron
description:
AC-130 Gunship Simulator: Special Ops Squadron is an action, shooter and simulation game developed by Byte Conveyor Studios. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
AC-130 Gunship Simulator: Special Ops Squadron is available on iOS and Android.
